entries.journal_entry_description: You met a hunter named Carl Mosik at the start of the Ryyatt trail that wants to hire you to do a bit of hunting for him.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Kill a Minstyngar in the Wroshyr Canopy and take their Horn as a trophy. Only a horn of pristine quality will be acceptable.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: A Trandoshan slaver appears to have taken offense to your presence and attack.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Return the Pristine Horn to Carl Mosik
